body:
Medals can’t be given to family members without evidence the serviceperson has died.

Contact [dbs-medals@mod.uk](mailto:dbs-medals@mod.uk), if you have questions about medal applications.

[Read about military awards and commemorations](https://www.gov.uk/topic/defence-armed-forces/military-awards-commemorations)
heading: You must provide evidence of the serviceperson’s death
